entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
